评论概述: Not at all what I expected
评论详情: It says the shirt is supposed to be for a female and fitted and it’s not at all! It says it’s supposed to be a large which is my normal size and it’s about three sizes too big and the material feels Christie and looks very faded

Love the message of this shirt, which is the main reason I bought it. The shirt is also super comfortable! It does run fairly large in my opinion. I ordered a women's cut small and it was loose everywhere. Still worth it!
